channel.title: The Safehouse News
channel.description: The Rogue Community site for all your MMORPG news!!

item.title: Nvidia Launches Fastest Card on the Planet
item.description:
Today nVidia released the GeForce 8800 graphics processors, and there's no doubt that both the 8800GTX and 8800GTS are very fast cards.

They usher in DirectX 10, unified shaders, and shader model 4.0, but as there are currently no Dx10 benchmarks or games they must be judged (for now) on their Dx9 capabilities.  In that area they pass with flying colors.

Here are a few of the reviews from the web:

The Tech Report

HardOCP

Tom's Hardware

ExtremeTech

FiringSquad

item.title: Vanguard Pricing Released
item.description:
Sigil has released pricing and content information for Vanguard! There will be a Pre-Order, Regular Edition and Collector's & Guild Edition.


Regular Edition - $49.99 MSRP

Collector’s & Guild Edition Details - $89.99 MSRP

Read on for details.

item.title: Cryptic, Microsoft, and Marvel announce 'Marvel Universe Online'
item.description:
As per the press release on Cryptic Studio's website:

Today at X06, Xbox’s annual official industry event in Barcelona, Spain, Microsoft Game Studios announced further details around its eagerly awaited project based on the Marvel universe of Super Heroes. Microsoft and Marvel Entertainment confirmed that Cryptic Studios has been named the developer of “Marvel Universe Online,” the highly anticipated massively multiplayer online (MMO) video game exclusive to Xbox 360 and Windows Vista.

item.title: A Day in The Life of a Vanguard Beta Rogue
item.description:
Hello rogues. Just wanted to let you all know that the rogue is alive and well in Vanguard:Saga of Heroes. Under Brad McQuaid's nod of approval, I offer up a quick glimpse at the Vanguard rogue. Hopefully with more to follow.

A Day in the Life of a Vanguard Rogue

item.title: City of Heroes' Veteran Rewards: Wings!
item.description:
In conjunction with the release of Issue 8: To Protect and Serve, NCsoft and Cryptic Studios are pleased to announce the launch of the official City of Heroes® Veteran Rewards program. This program rewards our fans for their time spent supporting and playing City of Heroes and City of Villains®.

Specifically, for each increment of three months with an active account, players will unlock valuable in-game “items” which will come in the form of costumes, powers, badges, and more! The program is retroactive by player account and rewards will be applicable to all characters within each respective account.

item.title: The Serpent's Spine Preview
item.description: The Safehouse's own Dalnoth Vaz, EQ Rogue Correspondent, is now able to spill the beans about The Serpent's Spine EverQuest expansion. He shares details and screenshots in this preview article.

item.title: "How Cool Would it Be If..."
item.description:
What do you get when you cross a money-oozing professional athlete, an indie comic mogul, and an icon of high fantasy story telling?

Green Monster Games, LLC

Curt Schilling: President
Todd McFarlane: Art Director
R.A. Salvatore: Creative Director

An "out of left-field" (pardon the pun) powerhouse trio have come together to deliver another title into the MMORPG gaming world. The title/genre is yet to be announced...

item.title: Vanguard Combat Mini-video Live from Beta 3
item.description: Sigil has released this Vanguard combat video from Beta 3 with extensive notes. Having seen gameplay at Vanguard demos over the years and as recently as this past July at the SOE Block Party, I can add that this video is pretty close to what I've seen though not perfect. The notes preface explains that FRAPS was used so this may be the difference.

item.title: The Vanguard:Saga of Heroes Beta Quest has been Solved!
item.description:
Thank you for all who participated, and we recommend that you stick around awhile. Our September beta account quest should prove equally fun and require a bit more o' that grey matter between your ears.

Answers inside...

item.title: Fall 2006 Anime
item.description:
Fall 2006 Anime season is coming up in a few days! The list has grown, with 66 new anime. Listed within this will be all the names of the anime, the day they air, official websites, summaries, and such. Many titles have very limited information so some things may be missing, but those often are anime for he extremely young, and the like.

This year has a great variety of anime to look forward to for all genres! Lots of action, love, moe~ and traps!
